name: Givzie
culture_notes: Riveric-influenced dialect with Coastal Tongues loanwords
diet heavy on smoked/salted fish and river greens
frequent small public rites tied to tides and harvest
crafts: reedwork, small metal ritual fittings
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no long-range mind-influence or true resurrection
limited combustion industry; no high-pressure steam tech
notes: narrow waterways shape layout and defense
population unknown; likely under a few thousand
